donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
outputs.output_descr: A National Mine Action Legislative and Institutional Framework, with all necessary sub-structures, capable of planning, co-coordinating, implementing and monitoring all aspects of mine action in the country, within the framework of International Mine Action Standards (IMAS).

donor_name: DEPT OF FOR AFF & INTL TRADE GOV CANADA
outputs.output_descr: 1.	Work with National Mine Action Authority (NMAA) and Southern Sudan Demining Commission (SSDC) to undertake the destruction of 3,000-4,000 declared stockpiled antipersonnel mines under the obligations of Mine Ban Convention. 2. Work with SSDC to develop a Southern Sudan Mine Action Legislative Framework based on the provisions of the GOSS presidential Decree # 45. 3. Develop a mine action transition plan. 4. Establish 2 Mine Risk Education (MRE) Teams and 3 Explosive Ordnance Disposal (EOD) Teams and deploy them to high priority areas/communities for MRE and EOD activities and Attach the SSDC Staff on field placement.

A National Mine Action Legislative and Institutional Framework, with all necessary sub-structures, capable of planning, co-coordinating, implementing and monitoring all aspects of mine action in the country, within the framework of International Mine Action Standards (IMAS).

project_descr: Capacity Building to Support Mine Action Transition from Emergency to Recovery & Development in Sudan
